headline.print_headline: Air Force: 'So Help Me God' in Oath Is Optional
headline.main: Air Force: 'So Help Me God' in Oath Is Optional

docs.snippet: Airmen taking their enlistment or officer appointment oaths can omit the words "so help me God" if they choose, Air Force officials announced Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Airmen taking their enlistment or officer appointment oaths can omit the words "so help me God" if they choose, Air Force officials announced Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Warrant: SC Dad Feared 5 Slain Kids Would Kill Him
headline.main: Warrant: SC Dad Feared 5 Slain Kids Would Kill Him

docs.snippet: A South Carolina father who authorities said killed his five children believed the kids "were going to kill him, chop him up and feed him to the dogs," according to an unredacted arrest warrant released Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A South Carolina father who authorities said killed his five children believed the kids "were going to kill him, chop him up and feed him to the dogs," according to an unredacted arrest warrant released Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Australian 'Counter-Terrorism' Raids Foil Beheading Plot: Media
headline.main: Australian 'Counter-Terrorism' Raids Foil Beheading Plot: Media

docs.snippet: Australian police will allege that members of a group targeted in a sweeping counter-terrorism operation on Thursday planned to behead a random member of the public after draping the victim in the flag of Islamic State militants, Australia media r...
docs.lead_paragraph: Australian police will allege that members of a group targeted in a sweeping counter-terrorism operation on Thursday planned to behead a random member of the public after draping the victim in the flag of Islamic State militants, Australia media reported.

headline.print_headline: Father: NFL Mishandled My Daughter's Abuse Case
headline.main: Father: NFL Mishandled My Daughter's Abuse Case

docs.snippet: The father of a woman who once dated NFL receiver Brandon Marshall called for the league's commissioner to resign Wednesday because he's disappointed in the way his daughter's abuse allegations were handled....
docs.lead_paragraph: The father of a woman who once dated NFL receiver Brandon Marshall called for the league's commissioner to resign Wednesday because he's disappointed in the way his daughter's abuse allegations were handled.

headline.print_headline: USDA Approves New Modified Corn, Soybean Seeds
headline.main: USDA Approves New Modified Corn, Soybean Seeds

docs.snippet: The Agriculture Department has approved the use of genetically modified corn and soybean seeds that are resistant to a popular weed killer....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Agriculture Department has approved the use of genetically modified corn and soybean seeds that are resistant to a popular weed killer.

headline.print_headline: Apple iOS 8 Software Bug Affects Health Apps
headline.main: Apple iOS 8 Software Bug Affects Health Apps

docs.snippet: A bug in Apple's new iOS 8 software for mobile devices is prompting the company to withhold apps that use a highly touted feature for keeping track of fitness and health data....
docs.lead_paragraph: A bug in Apple's new iOS 8 software for mobile devices is prompting the company to withhold apps that use a highly touted feature for keeping track of fitness and health data.

headline.print_headline: Humana CEO: New Competition Curbs Obamacare Plan Prices
headline.main: Humana CEO: New Competition Curbs Obamacare Plan Prices

docs.snippet: New competition between health insurers offering so-called Obamacare plans in 2015 is having an impact on the pricing of such coverage, based on a first look at proposed insurance premiums, the head of Humana Inc said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: New competition between health insurers offering so-called Obamacare plans in 2015 is having an impact on the pricing of such coverage, based on a first look at proposed insurance premiums, the head of Humana Inc said on Wednesday.
